𒍝 ća wie close?

𒍝-zaⁿ > jun in 𒄑𒍝𒁀𒈝-zaⁿbalum juniper #supālu
zaⁿbalum [JUNIPER] 𒄑𒍝𒁀𒈝 𒄑𒍝𒁀𒀠 𒄑𒍝𒁀𒇴 𒄑𒍝𒈽𒀕 ĝeš-zaⁿba-lum ĝeš-zaⁿba-al ĝeš-zaⁿba-lam ĝeš-zaⁿbalam -zabalam "juniper" #supālu

𒍝 Zitter > ⲕⲓⲑⲁⲣⲁ kithara "lyre" in
𒍝 quatro ≈ ⲕⲓⲑⲁⲣⲁ kithara ≈ guitar in
𒍝 four≈bar in φόρμιγξ 𒄑𒍝𒁉𒌈 barbūt ˢhearpe harp Zupfe? ĝeš-za-bi-tum-zabitum #sabītu "lyre" 里拉 lǐlā

𒁀𒍝 ba-quar ≈ 𒆪𒊒 #kurûᵇᵃ cripple

𒄑𒍝𒁀𒀠 ĝeš-za-ba-al 𒄑𒍝𒁀𒈝 ĝeš-za-ba-lum 𒄑𒍝𒁀𒇴 ĝeš-za-ba-lam 𒄑𒍝𒈽𒀕 ĝeš-zabalam "juniper" zabalum #supāluᵐ <> palm <> Baum

𒄑𒍝𒁀𒈝 ĝeš-zaⁿba-rum-zanibar ≈ "juniper"

𒍝 za SOUND

𒍝 za -se do-sound (noise) in …

𒃰𒋺 ašša₂ ašša lamentation clamor, uproar, voice, cry, noise, accail 𒁍𒌓𒁀𒀜𒍝 bu-ud-ba-ad-za budbad-za "to make noise" 𒁄𒁄𒍝 bul₃-bal-za bulbal-za "to make noise" 𒁔𒁔𒌓𒍝 bur₂bur₂babbar-za burburbabbar-za "to make noise" 𒁾𒁳𒍝 𒁾𒋰𒍝 𒁾𒁾𒍝 𒁾𒆪𒍝 𒁾𒁕𒀊𒍝 dub-dab-za dub-dab₂ dubdab-za "to make noise" 𒁺𒁍𒌌𒁕𒁀𒀠𒍝 du-bu-ul-da-ba-al-za dubuldabal-za "to make noise" 𒌈𒁮𒍝 dum-dam-za dumdam-za "to make noise" 𒈝𒂵𒀀𒀭𒍝 𒈝𒂵𒍝 𒄘𒌦𒄘𒌦𒂷𒍝 𒄘𒌦𒄘𒌦𒍝 𒈝𒈝𒍝 𒈝𒈝𒀀𒀭𒍝 gum₂ga-am₃ gumgam-za "to make noise" za gum₂gum₂-za gum₂ga-za gu₂uĝ₃-gu₂uĝ₃-ĝa₂za gu₂uĝ₃-gu₂uĝ₃ sound 𒄷𒌦𒄩𒍝 𒄷𒌝𒄩𒍝 hu-un-ha-za hu-um-ha-za hunha-za "to make noise" 𒆲𒂵𒀭𒍝 kun-ka₃-an-za kunkan-za "to make noise" 𒀯𒈠𒀠𒍝 mul-ma-al-za mulmal-za "to make noise" 𒁍𒌓𒉺𒀜𒍝 pu-ud-pa-ad-za pudpad-za "to make noise" 𒁍𒊌𒉺𒀝𒍝 pu-ug-pa-ag-za pugpag-za "to make noise" 𒄗𒄗𒍝 suh₃-sah₄za suhsah-za "to make noise" 𒄯𒄯𒍝 ur₅-ar₃za urar-za "to make noise" 𒉿𒉿𒍝 𒉿𒁀𒍝 𒉿𒉿𒉌 𒅇𒀀𒍝 𒇇𒀀𒀀𒀀𒍝 wu-wa-za wu-wa₂za wu-wa-zal u₃-a-za u₈-a-a-a-za wuwa-za "to make noise" 𒍣𒅅𒍝𒀝𒍝 zi-ig-za-ag-za zigzag-za "to make noise" 𒍝𒉺𒉘 𒍣 𒉺𒉘 za-pa-aĝ₂ zi-pa-aĝ₂ zipaĝ voice, noise breath Sprache #napištu 𒀫𒍝𒅈𒍝 zur-za-ar-za zurzar-za "to make noise"
